page.title: 03LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: LEISURE AND RECREATION Grid Squares 7,11_ Square 7 has a private tennis court,Belmont School Playing Fields and a riding school. Square 11 has public playing fields at Mill Field and Arrandene Open Space. The Buckland Society operates indoor and outdoor sports at Mill Hill Public School which anyone can join. Grid Squares 1,2,3_ Swimming(most of the people surveyed were fairly old,which stopped them from going. There are no public swimming pools in the immediate area and therefore they found other forms of leisure). Cinema(this is considered to be lower to middle class and the area is upper class. Compared to the theatre cinema going was less popular).Clubs(visited mainly by elderly women). Park(most people have big gardens so they do not visit the park often).
